channel.title: Creation of Mentios 3
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/2VaWO.jpg[/img]
[B]Official Launch: 26.5.2013
[/B]-Revision: 667 Loading 696. - Decided to use higher cache, we won't have the new armours tho, and never will.
This is the thread where I will daily update this and show you all the progress. [B]We can call this Mentios 3.[/B]
[U][B]Updates [/B][/U] 14.5.2013: Updated networking, also implemented 718s combat system. 15.5.2013: I've been customizing the server and making it more play-able. 16.5.2013: Starter system spent 6 hours to make. 17.5.2013: - Dungeoneering with an tokens points system. 17.5.2013(2): Fixed all known Grand Exchange dupes. 17.5.2013 (3): Some sort of Noticeboard -tab was made. [img]http://puu.sh/2VbBD.jpg[/img] Added FAQ below this from the news at Mentios site to answer to some questions.
[B]Mentios 3 FAQ [/B][COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: Will the players get totally reseted?[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: I'm afraid but yes, we have really no choice. The current old economy was horrible and here even having 40M will be much.[/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: What version is Mentios 3? (Revision)[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: 667 Loading 667 cache.
[/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: Why you want to make server again then?[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: I do what I love, programming. [/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: Will any old or veteran players get extra?[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: I will be making some sort of early-bird bonus for the private launch which is at: 20.5.2013.[/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: Where you've been, Nexon?[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: Just simply been too busy with real life.[/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: Will Mentios 3 stay online and being updated?[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: I have already put all my skills and hope in to this, I hope that we will hit decent amount of players which is easily possible with this kind of server, such an realistic content and awesome gameplay![/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial][B]Question: Will this server stay long online?[/B][/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#545454][FONT=Arial]Answer: I will guatarantee that, I have really put all my hope in to this.[/FONT][/COLOR] [B]
Update Media (Changed daily) [/B] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2VaW5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2VaZJ.jpg[/img] [/CENTER]

item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Apologizies, we cannot launch the game at: 26.5.2013, our website has crashed and we’re working on it. We will need to change name servers which will take 24-48 hours. The good part is that the game is configured, so is the hiscores and of course IPB Forums.

Release Day: 28.5.2013

Update:

Task system started
New developer joined: Marcbob.

item.title: Creation of Mentios 3
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

2 Days until release!

Season 2 for Hoarfrost Hollow has been completed. [Battle Quest: Hoarfrost Hollow]

Media

Hoarfrost Depths, season 2: Boss battle session.

Player entering in to boss session.

Once boss is dead player will receive book, this book can only readed by magicians of lunar island (Meteora).
Player must bring the book to Meteora.



Quest complete

Hoarfrost Depths rewards unlock once quest is done. Requirement is the season 1 to unlock it.

item.description:

Battle Quest Rewarder Added , second npc to home. Not planning to add more cuz it would look horrible with 100k shops and other random spawns.

Fixed magic combat, it was buggy af for some reason.

Price checker bugs fixed

EDIT: Cannot smuggle anything during the tutorial:

EDIT 2:
As you maybe can see, I have started developing the new -Battle Quest- which is season 2 for Hoarfrost Hollow. Name of this quest will be: “Hoarfrost Depths”.

item.title: Creation of Mentios 3
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Sup22211:

bump

Respect.

Updates so far:
-Fixed Integer.MAX_VALUE; dupes. Not really, but I spent over 6-7 hours just to fix bugs. Was definitely worth it tho!
-Grand Exchange is ready to use, people cannot buy prod and other insane op items e.g torva, ags just from GE. These items must be achieved from bosses / Quests
-Started new quest: White Knight Fallen, this will be very hard quest.
reward(s):
*All Recipe for Disaster gloves.

I made a trailer of Mentios 3:

Read full topic

item.title: Creation of Mentios 3
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

This probably the most unique 718+ server I’ve seen in a while. The only unappealing thing is the fullscreen gameframe. Use a sprite editor and change them.

This is 667 with 718’s Combat System. ^^

Also updates:
Been programming hardcore yesterday
After a player has completed the first battle quest: Hoarfrost Hollow, players will have now access to use Father Aereck’s services. Father Aereck will be changing you spell / prayer books for now. There will be a new battle quest for curses.

Hoarfrost Hollow quest guide ft. my quest system:

Updates of 21.5.2013

Implementations:
-Grahams Event System.

Other:
-Implemented 718 Matrix NPC Definitions, Drop System, Combat system. (woot the drops ain’t buggy anymore).
-Quest binding updated a bit, contains saving also.
-Grand exchange dupes has been patched, also other Matrix dupes and exploits.
-Completed Quest unbinding.

About the quest binding:
As many of us know, the feeling isn’t the best when you’re completing a custom storyline quest in a RSPS. The quest binder wills solve this problem; it will be telling you what you need to do next, this is optional. You do not have to use quest binder. When we launch game 26.5.2013 if you notice any bugs in the quests system please report to Nexon / Fuzen Seth. This system was hand-written by myself from empty .java file.

Read full topic
